name: get-child-objects
title: Get Child Objects
description: Get all the child objects in the scene for a given parent, use 0 for the root objects.

parentId.description: The id of the parent or '0' for the root.

javascript: const objs = Object.values(BS.BanterScene.GetInstance().objects); return JSON.stringify(objs.filter(obj=>obj.parent === parentId).map(obj=>({name: obj.name, unityId: obj.unityId, children: objs.filter(_obj=>Number(_obj.parent) === Number(obj.unityId)).map(obj=>({name: obj.name, unityId: obj.unityId, numberOfChildren: objs.filter(_obj=>Number(_obj.parent) === Number(obj.unityId)).length}))})))
